QuestData.Title: Echoes of Tortured Souls
QuestData.Description: Delving into the citadel with so few is risky at best, but opportunities like this are too rare to pass up.$B$BClear the way to the far side and secure the passage to the Pit of Saron. We will need to hold it to move our men further into the Citadel.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Bronjahm and the Devourer of Souls to secure access to the Pit of Saron.
QuestData.RewardText: The Pit of Saron lies ahead, and if our scouts are correct, past that will be the Halls of Reflection.$B$BIt is there that Arthas lets his guard down, and it is there that we hope to find a clue to his weakness... and a route to vengeance long overdue.
